1549953207_1LGLe311PAqQm63B2A1MnFctPm8W2.body: I've used "Ring" (more or less Jami's predecessor, they recently renamed the whole project). Basically, it's a peer to peer messenger using a distributed hash table to store your data, but it can be used as SIP phone too (centralized). AFAIK everything's encrypted, so nothing to really worry about from first sight.
